summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period from September 1, 2014, to September 30, 2014. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned, indicating the financial activity of an account associated with the Butterfly Trust.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details account balances for the Butterfly Trust at Deutsche Bank.
The beginning balance as of September 1, 2014, was $58,053.22.
The ending balance as of September 30, 2014, was $58,054.54.
Interest earned during the period was $1.32.
There were service charges including NSF return item fees totaling $50.00.
